case.state: Today mark's the day Brawl Stars was softlaunched!
Woohoo! Happy Birthday, Brawl Stars!
Happy New Year!
Happy Valentine's Day, ~player~!
America, Fuck yeah!
Shit, is it already that time of year again?
'Sup. I'm Brock. Let's do this.
Strip Poker? Sure thing, dawg! I'm game!
Awww yeah, Strip Poker! Bring it on!
Brock's the name, rocketeering's my game!
Happy Holidays, ~player~!
Whew...shit's gonna get cold.
Ready to ramp up the holidays with us, ~player~?
(Hol' up...Does that girl over there not have any hands?)
Wait a minute, Why's there a butterfly in our game?
...Really?...Master?
So what's yo specialty, O Master Playa'?
...Are you fuckin' with me right now?
...Is this some kind of racist joke I'm too black to understand?
...Is it because I'm black?
Nice to meet'cha Mister...uh...what?
Oh shit, it's Nicky! How ya doin' dawg?
Nicky, mah man!
Yo, Nicky! Ready to blast the competition?
...Not gonna lie, that name is kinda hot.
By the end of this game, we'll see who's the real Daddy!
Hol' up...Is that another new brawler coming or- oh...never mind.
...Hm. Something about that trainer girl don't seem right...
Game on!
Alright, It's go time!
Woo! Let's go!
We starting? Cool, let's do this.
Nah, I'm good dealer.
It's all good, dealer.
I'mma keep these.
Oh for fuck sake, just take 'em all!
Nothing...just take my cards, dealer.
Swapping my whole hand for the win!
Let's get this party started!
Let's start this party with a bang!
Boom baby! Let's do this!
Let's blow this party up!
~Cards.text~ should do the trick.
~Cards.text~ for the win!
Show me what'cha got!
Gotta loot ~cards.text~!
~Cards.text~ cards, dealer!
Alright, show me the cards!
Big money, big money!
Gimme that high score!
~Cards.text~ cards!
Boom!
Ka-boom!
Badaboom!
Badabing Badaboom!
One, Two, Three, SHOOT!
~Cards.text~ should do the trick.
~Cards.text~ for the win!
Show me what'cha got!
Gotta loot ~cards.text~ cards!
~Cards.text~ cards, dealer!
Alright, show me the cards!
Big money, big money!
Gimme that high score!
~Cards.text~ cards!
Hell yeah! Off to an awesome start!
Yeah! Startin' this party right!
Let's GOOO!
Awww shit! Here we go!
Hot damn!
Awww yeah!
Hell yeah!
Boom box, baby!
That's what I'm talking about!
Dealer, you're alright.
These are cards are as explosive as a rocket rain!
Wooooo-eeee!
Perfect!
Boom box, baby!
Now we're talking!
Dealer, you're the best.
Awesome! Just what I needed!
Now I'm groovin'!
Still in the game!
Whew...this is getting close.
Cool, cool...I'm still good.
Pretty cool start, let's hope this keeps up!
Not a bad start to this stripfest!
Sweet! I can start just fine with this!
This can work.
I can still play with these.
Eh, this is alright.
What can I do with these babies?
Huh...
Not great, but this could be alright.
Could be worse.
Ehh...not as explosive as I thought they'd be.
Hm. What to do...
This hand ain't too bad.
This hand ain't bad...just boring.
Like a firework with no color, this hand is pretty dull.
This hand is coming in clutch...
My life's on the line here...
Let's hope this is good enough!
I can still play with these.
What can I do with these?
Huh.
Not great, but this could be alright.
Could be worse.
Ehh...not as explosive as I thought they'd be.
Let's hope someone has worse cards.
What now?
...Not a great start.
Ah...party foul.
Whoops, probably got a bit too excited...
Ah, what a vibe killer.
...For real?
...You gotta be kidding.
These cards are not cool.
Dealer, are you trying to screw me over?
...Duds...These cards are just duds.
...Nerfed.
...That can't be right...
...Now wait just a second...
...For real?
Are you serious!?
Dealer!
Dealer, whatever you're doing. Stop that.
C'mon Dealer, I thought we had something close!
...Nerfed again?
Well shit.
Ah, blast.
Wait! I'm not ready!
Oh, fuck me!
God damn it!
FuckfuckFUCK!
Wack.
Oh hell, this could be it...
This is looking real bad for Brock!
Oh shit.
Oh absolutely. I think Nita is probably one of the youngest on my squad. She may seem vulnerable, but once she brings out that bear, WOO! She can do some serious damage.
Oh absolutely. Leon is pretty young, but damn, his job as a stealthy assassin is no joke, I tell ya what!
I know that person. That person is me, T-B-H.
Well, other than myself...Colt can be pretty reckless with his guns, but more often than not, he leaves without a scratch.
Besides myself, Carl...Oh damn, that dude can tailspin for HOURS on his little minecart and still somehow not crash into anything!
Oh, that's easy. You just have to know a lot of shit and be able to explain it as simply as ya can!
Girl, the list goes on for me. I legit thought Sandy was a girl, but once that sunuva' bitch began yawning, I knew that ain't no girly yawn.
Girl, the list goes on for me. Spike seems sweet and innocent on the outside, but can be really ruthless if given the right conditions.
Girl, the list goes on for me. Once you see under Tara's robes...Trust me, you'll never be the same again.
Girl, the list goes on for me. I was thinking, since Gene is a genie and all, he'd actually be a lot smarter, but all he really does is blabber on like he's speaking some made up language!
Damn, If you want someone that just don't stop? Just go talk to Max. Once she drinks those energy drinks, she'll not stop running until she's stopped.
Damn, If you want someone that just don't stop? Once Dynamike got some TNT on him, you cannot stop him from detonating shit left and right.
Damn, If you want someone that just don't stop? Just look at Tick...Who the hell knows what goes on in his detachable lil' head of his.
All really depends on what that thing is...But most of the time, I just do my own thing. Nobody gonna keep me down from doing what I love!
Rocket-fueled steaks are the best steaks you can ask for! Trust me, I gotta have you try one sometime!
Who cares? As long as they're gucci, I'm all for pretty much anything!
Probably Ricochet. He may be a robot, but robots can have feelings too. When he's around Piper...Hoo boy. He can get flustered!
I'd say Leon...He's got nerfed so many times that I lost count!
I'd say Rosa...She was practically a goddess until she lost her touch.
Oh Nita? Well, she's basically a bit of a wild one. In a pinch, she can just summon her bear to protect and kill for her!
Well, nobody's really seen what's under Tara's robes, but she stated herself that if anyone even tries, they'll probably die.
Aw yeah, Tick! He's literally a walking time bomb with a mind of his own! His head practically doubles as a devastating death bomb!
Well, I only really lie if I have to, like that time I complimented on Rico's new model...Nobody really liked it, but ya know...Whatever makes 'em happy.
Eh, I can tolerate 'em. After all, I work with a lot of smoke coming from my rockets!
Very important, girl. This rocket launcher ain't for jus' killlin' rogue robots...It's also there to protect those who really need it.
All of my friends are my family to me. And to me, that's really important.
Oh, I will spend it all on improvements to my launcher. Look, I love it to bits, but even my launcher has it's nerfs.
I really don't hold a lotta grudges, but they'd really have to do somethin' real stupid for me to never forgive 'em.
...Wait, what's wrong with rubber ducks?
You're afraid of rubber ducks? C'mon! They're cute! Jess has one that she uses instead of that robo-dog of hers.
Eh, a lot of my friends have sillier hats. I don't think it's too bad, dawg.
Well, I'm just named Brock because of my love for rockets! You know, Brock...Rocket...
Ah, you know...shoot rockets at rogue robots...bustin' open safes...having friendly brawls...Usual shit.
Oh, fo' sure! summer's the best time for a brawl!
I love the summer, dawg! Gives me an excuse to bring out the ol' shark launcher complete with water rockets!
Ah, it just depends on the situation. If I'm in a pinch, I usually have to think quickly. Otherwise, I just gloat to myself whenever necessary.
When in doubt, I just blame the launcher.
Definitely a shark. They move fast and they do a lotta damage if anyone don't get outta there way!
All. The fucking. Time.
Oh, I won't crash until I say so!
Oh, I go everywhere with my boombox. Don't wanna risk it gettin' stolen...or worse.
I really don't trust a lotta people with my launcher, that's why I take this shit with me everywhere.
Prolly this one. A lot of my wardrobe uses this same shirt.
This one, fo' sho. White's kinda my thing with a lotta my outfits.
Usually I think about just flyin' around everywhere with my launcher...just launchin' myself around with each lil' explosion I make on the ground.
I can handle heat pretty well too. I get struck by my own rockets all the time, and that shit can get pretty hot.
I do crazy shit all the time, no need for Barley to get me drunk.
Yeh...I did do that once or twice here. I rarely date, nowadays.
I mean, if we're both with another person, it don't make a difference.
In a relationship? Girl, I'm rarely in any of those. Even then, I just do what I usually do, no matter my status.
Girl, I've lost count by how many times I've masturbated to cum explosions.
Pretty often. I usually get myself off to explosions, and not just the fiery kinds.
As many as they can handle, Jess, As many as they can handle.
Ascend to Desire is my all-time favorite. Whether I'm with a guy or a girl.
Receiving? Eh...Haven't really done it much. It's 'aight.
Giving? Oh, hell yeah. Don't matter the hole for me.
Hey, thanks dude! I was gettin' kinda hungry.
Now this is turnin' to a real party!
I am gettin' kinda hungry, thanks Arash!
Woah, there's no fuckin' way that butterfly just spoke--
Did...Did that butterfly just talk!?
Am I trippin' or did that there butterfly just speak!?
Arash, y'all said you were a bow peron? I'm pretty sure you'd probably love Bo, one of my brawl buddies!
An archer eh? How long have y'all been doing that?
Yooo...A few thousand!? Bruh, you look amazing for your age!
Clima...wha?...Are you talkin' abou that staff lookin' thing y'all are holdin'? What's it do?
Your hand down my wha-...I mean...If y'all really insist, I guess?
Holy shit, did that sword just speak!?
Ah, seems like you're not the only one with companions. A lot of my friends has someone to lean on. All I got here is my boom box.
So your name's Jessie? I do have a lil' girl buddy that has the same name as you.
Thankfully, that one was not incendiary, otherwise we'd all be dead by now.
Well, it's hard to explain...All I can say is, we can heal pretty quickly, and that shirt? Just a regular shirt.
Hey, I didn't do it on purpose ya know. Everyone can get klutzy.
Well excu-u-u-se me for being klutzy e'ry once in a while, Damn!
Don't say it.
Not a fucking word, Mary.
Don't remind me.
...Don't...Just don't.
...Haki...what now? Oh, we just regenerate real quickly...Thank cartoon physics for that.

condition.saying: you're most skilled with

case.state: Dread...fighter? I mean, I guess that counts as a weapon, what does it do?
Dread fighter? Definitely sounds likes a weapon. and y'all are saying it's a kind of ship?

condition.saying: you're most skilled with

case.state: A laser ring? So what, you just point and it shoots out deadly lasers? Well, if it's as crazy as it sounds, you'd make for a pretty damn good Brawler.
Ah, I don't judge. I know of some people that use the bulky kind of weapons like you say 'men' only do. Take Shelly for example, that effin' shotgun ain't no joke.
Odd of y'all to assume that certain weapons should be assigned to gender. I mean, you do you, girl, that ring is unique to you anyhow!
Antiques, huh? Are we talkin' like...primitive shit, or what the people did back in the days of war?
Eugh...if those lasers are as dangerous as they seem, I better start takin' 8-Bit more seriously.
Well, y'all wouldn't be too far off. Frank likes to uses a bulky hammer, and Bull ain't shit without his bulky shotgun, so I kinda see where ya'll are gettin' at.
I mean...not all men use bulky mech stuff. Like Carl, all he uses is his freakin' pickaxe!
Yeesh, ain't that just a little bit of an overkill? Our own battle style ain't that action-packed...
Ah, I have a few...Rico and Piper are gettin' pretty close, despite their different species...One of them's a robot.
Ah yeh, I know a few! Emz is constantly tryin' to get with Poco...and I just find it adorable in a weird way.
Yeh, I know a few...It's very possible that Jacky has this weird role reversal thing going with Carl.
Well, I'd just tell 'em to man up! They ain't gonna hurt anybody if they don't mean to.
If sleepiness counts as a sickness, Sandy definitely has it...
Oh, that's definitely Tara. She's a whole 'nother person behind her face mask.
To an unhealthy degree? I mean, I'd probably take advantage of it. But ya know what I do with crazy people?
Ooh, you're definitely talkin' about Jacky. She looks so young and innocent, but the moment you tell her she's cute, she'll just cuss ya out.
I'd say Piper. She definitely seems younger, but is pretty much a full grown-ass woman!
You're definitely talkin' aboout me and Bull...Man, I hate that bulky asshole.
I'd say Mortis and Frank...Mortis is a bit of a petty asshole, but Frank is kinda dumb. Not a great combo...
Well, with Rico and Piper, Piper protects him at all costs, and Rico does have a lil' tattoo of her...I'd say they're forever.
I'm pretty sure Emz won't want to let go of Poco...She's kinda creepy, man...
Ah, that? Well...I guess they heal pretty quickly, to be honest.
Really, anything that is grilled on a grill! You can never got wrong with some rocket-fueled meat!
Beat them up? All it takes is one rocket to get a reaction out of them, the rocket don't even have to hit them!
I'll have what y'all are havin'! That's some good shit right there!
With that being said...Let's just continue this game. I don't want anyone giving Kyoko any guff, or y'all will hear from me.
Showdown time.
This is it! The final showdown.
Showdown!
Damn, that's a nice gun ya got there, cowgirl.
Nice gun there, girl. What's your specialty? Up close or ranged?
Maybe you are a Brawl Star! AIM-ee...There's no way that's not accidental!
Ya know...back when I was little, people usually called me "Rocket Girl..." What's up with that?
Girl, if y'all want to see my cock that badly, y'all have to work for it, and only then you'll know how big it is.
Well, if y'are trying to find out how big this 'rocket' is, you gotta take me down first!
Damn girl, are ya that thirsty? Well...Y'all better hope I have shit cards from then on, otherwise this package is staying sealed!
Hey y'all, I gotta question. What kind of weapon or...object you're most skilled with?

condition.saying: massive thing

case.state: Oh this thing? This be my rocket launcher, but I like to call it my "boom box!"

condition.saying: W-Why did you bring

case.state: Oh, my boom box? I keep it everywhere with me. Seriously, I can't trust anyone stealin' that shit from me.

condition.saying: I don't want to die!

case.state: Woah, girl, chill! I ain't here to cause a ruckus! I'm just here to strip, that's it. Nothing more!

condition.saying: I'd talk more with you

case.state: Well, I've had this here rocket launcher for a long ass time, I can see why you'd be afraid of it...Has a bit of intimidation don't ya think?

condition.saying: It's scary.

case.state: Oh, c'mon now, I really only brought it here just so Bull or any of his goons don't try to steal it while I'm here.

condition.saying: on its own

case.state: Nah, that'd be ridiculous. It ain't like some of the other sentient shit I've seen.
Woo, if my rocket launcher had a mind of its own, That'd be crazy dangerous, even for me.
Yuh! USA represent, amirite?
Yee! That's true. Born and raised there, now I'm here playing with y'all!
Mhm! That's me! From the good U S of A!

condition.saying: You'll kill us all if you fire!

case.state: Woah, chill girl! I'm only here for the strip party, not to kill anyone!...At least, I hope I don't have to.

condition.saying: Are you trying to kill all of us?

case.state: ...What do you take me for, a terrorist? Girl, I take this boom box with me everywhere I go. Can y'all blame me for keeping this in the right hands?

condition.saying: Are you insane?

case.state: Insane? Girl, you haven't seen insane until you've met Dynamike. That ol' geezer would of blown this place up by now.

condition.saying: Don't think insane recklessness will intimidate me!

case.state: Seriously? I ain't that reckless. I know better than to just fire this shit. Y'all should be lucky Dynamike don't have a hold of this.
Oh this? This here be my rocket launcher, but I like to call it my boombox!
Ah me? I'm a Brawler. Usually a lot of my other buds and I go out and just fight each other for fun!
Well, I'm glad you asked, Jess. I'm a Brawler. A lot of my other friends just go out and fight whatever's out there for us!
Yeah, I hear that too...Wait...
Oh, y'all are talkin' about my boombox, yeah? Just think of it as your standard rocket launcher with a twist!
Not jus' any cannon, Pit-Dude, It's my rocket launcher, but I like to call it my 'Boombox!'
Ooh, fo' real? What kind of attachments y'all got on that sucka?
Oh yeah? What gave you that idea?
..Well, I'm surprised my rocket didn't come back yet...Ya think it's gonna come back and get me?
Ah, there goes my streak.
Oh well. Can't win 'em all.
No matter, I'm still ballin'!
Woo! Brock is OP! I'm still pretty much up there.
Aww, it was fun while it lasted.
This game is pretty cool...but I wonder where that other rocket went though...
Aw man. Guess I have to lose the jeans, huh?
Well, this is it. This ain't over yet!
Well, guess I gotta get started, huh?
Hoo boy...At least I'm not dead last.
Aight. My turn to shine...
I'm really between a Brock and a hard place, aren't I?
Aww...guess I have no choice but to give up my rocket launcher, huh?
My rocket launcher? Are you sure you want me to?
Does anyone else hear that whistling sound?
Back to me, huh? Guess I'll have to make do.
Okay, I'll admit. Y'all got skills.
I'm gonna be on my last bar of health...
Oof, I'm pretty sure I was laggin'.
C'mon now, this ain't cool.
Alright, this ain't funny anymore.
Well ain't that a kick in the ass...
Oh, give me a break! I barely even had time to flex!
Ooh, well aren't you so lucky.
First, I lost my rocket launcher, now I got this stinking hand? What's next, I get decked by my own rocket?
What kind of spin-teaming bullshit is this?!
God mothafucking damn it.
Nerfed to the ground...
Already down to my last life...

condition.saying: If you're here to eliminate a few Mejarian aggressors

case.state: Girl, were you even listening? I'm here to party and shit, not deal with this kind of bullshit.

condition.saying: And what might drive you to kill someone?

case.state: Oh, just loosen up already. I really only fire this thing if they deserve to be fired on. It's not y'all are threatening to kill me.
Look, would y'all rather have me keep this with me safely, or do you want some thug like Bull to just blow this place up without any reason?
...I've had this boombox for almost my entire life...and y'all want me to just not bring it with me?

condition.saying: As if I'd let my guard down

case.state: Look, I ain't here to cause a ruckus...Feel free to have your panties in a knot around me, but I jus' wanna enjoy my time here.
Look, you can be as uptight as you wanna be, but know that I won't try to fire this thing at you unless you tryna test me.

condition.saying: you expect me to listen to a man with explosives on his shoulder

case.state: Touch. Explosives can be pretty dangerous on anyone, but I'm telling you, I ain't like that.
...As ridiculous the name sounds, I ain't lyin'. Y'all need a moment to just relax?

condition.saying: A rocket launcher goes far beyond

case.state: Well, one thing's for sure, they wouldn't mess with a guy with a rocket launcher.
I guess so, but trust me, if you've seen some of the fights I've been in, it'd make my boombox seem like a kid's toy.

condition.saying: Don't insult my intelligence!

case.state: That, and I don't want it to get stolen. What, you think I'm bullshittin' you?

condition.saying: What is that large thing you're carrying around?

case.state: Oh, my rocket launcher? Eh, it's just something I keep with me at all times, it's no biggie...

condition.saying: That box you've got... it seems dangerous.

case.state: Well, it certainly ain't called a "Boom Box" for nuttin'!
Yeh, pretty much. All of that fightin' can really bring a lot outta you, jus' sayin'.
Yep, even reckless guys like myself gotta relax every once in a while, ya know?
Oh, this is more than just a toy, it's- OH SHIT!
Yeah, I hear ya...I'll just put it down slowy, and- SHIT!
Definitely a lot handier than using my fists, I'd say.
Damn, that's interesting--
Yeah, it's a bit of a deadweight, but trust me, I really don't mind luggin' this thing around if it means it not falling into the wrong hands.
These shoes can be a real pain in my ass sometimes...
I kinda wish I had slip-ons...These are always a pain.
You guys ain't seeing shit yet. This is probably gonna be the only other skin you see this round!
These ain't too special, just saying.
This is...low key annoying...
Shout out to all my lady brawlers out there...I mean you, Shelly!
This one goes out to all the ladies out there...
Y'all ready for this?
Lemme just go ahead and- WOAH!
Alright, I'll set this down and- GEEZ!
Fine, I'll go ahead and- SHOOT!
I'm not givin' up my glasses. They're pretty valuable you know.
The glasses stay on, so the jeans will go...
I'd be willing to take one for the team and get the jeans out of here.
Hoo boy...Time to show off my other "rocket launcher"...
If y'all need to shield your eyes, I won't blame ya.

condition.saying: don't think I'll hesitate to subdue you

case.state: And don't think I'll "hestitate" to subdue the subduing.

condition.saying: Do not test me.

case.state: As long as y'all don't test me either, I think we'll get along just fine.

condition.saying: And don't talk about my underwear

case.state: It's an expression ya dingus. Now I know y'all can't take a joke.
I don't mean it literally, unless this is the rare time that your panties are literally in a knot.

condition.saying: Don't move

case.state: Don't move? Psssh, I'll move and groove all I want!
Don't move? That's like tellin' me to not be black.

condition.saying: men themselves are so often hostiles

case.state: Excuse me? Not all guys are hostile, have y'all even took the time to try to meet one?

condition.saying: Don't make any sudden movements

case.state: Don't move at all? What, y'all want to paint me or somethin'?
Don't move at all? Y'all would have to freeze me fo' that to happen!

condition.saying: By all means, convince me otherwise.

case.state: Fine, I will. Y'all will see that I ain't so bad, despite the boombox I carry on my back.

condition.saying: You are not the first man I've dealt with.

case.state: I wonder what kind of fucked up planet y'all are from to think that men are just hostile pigs.

condition.saying: then why did you bring it at all?

case.state: Y'all really want this shit to fall into the wrong hands? Can't really trust anyone handlin' this shit but me.

condition.saying: I suggest you abandon whatever plan that is.

case.state: Look, I'm just here to play cards, not deal with explosive bullshit. Dealer! Cards!

condition.saying: be warned that I'll fire.

case.state: Oh, don't think I won't retaliate if y'all try to turn me into fried chicken.
Look, if y'all wanna brawl, save it for after the game.

condition.saying: Take care not to make threatening moves

case.state: You have my word. No explosives will be shot tonight.
Whatever y'all say. Don't think I won't be watchin' you myself, Dealer, next round.
Aight then. I'll be watchin' you myself, in case y'all try confiscatin' this like some sort of po-licewoman.
Believer what y'all want to believe, girl. I'mma die with this thing in my hand, so get used to it.
I'm tellin' y'all that I'm not like Bull, even though I know him doesn't mean I am him.
Enough messin' around...It's time to--HUH.
Alright, play time's over...Gotta let it rock and show off my nice, black--wait, NO.
Can't mess up now. This beat is sick, and I gotta show that girl my-- wait, WHAT.
I've taken a few hits, but I don't mind a lil' healin', Thanks.
Did ya really think I did that on purpose?
...Well, guess I destroyed my own clothing too...That's fine!
Why that look? Don't worry 'bout it, dawg! It won't bite! As long as y'all don't either.
Well, blue and white...but hey! At least someone notices my style.
Well, a bit of white too...But thanks for noticin'.
Eh? How so? I wonder what kind of reward y'all are talkin' here...
Hm...No matter what it is, I ain't denyin' free shit.
Well, it's either that or some other bozos try to steal it.
I keep it with me, jus' in case some other asshole tries to steal it.
Yep...I'm okay...I take shit like that all the time.
Blue and white are two of my favorite colors, it's jus' my style, girl!
Gee, thanks a lot, Mary. Now I feel mighty confident for myself.
Well, why don't you try carryin' that thing?
Wow, thanks Mary. Real kind words comin' from ya.
Ah, sorry angel girl, that was a rocket I just shot out...Jus' a lil' clumsy under pressha'...
You know...That's a good question. I mean, I've gotten killed before, but never by my own weapon...
But yeh...Weapons like these are far better than melee I always say!
Wait a sec...Smash Tournaments? Hey, we kinda do that kind of thing too!
Oh, but the vest is the best part, dawg! Nah, I kid, it's not exactly flashy, but I had to take it off sometime.
Yeh...real lucky there... Sorry 'bout that, y'all.
Well, these glasses are like family to me. Even though I don't have my rocket laucnehr now, I'd make sure they'd get it!
Bruh, I wish it could, T-B-H. That would bring a whole new meanin' to 'secret weapon!'
Woah, dawg. My boom box ain't sentient like your sword is. I just got itchy trigger fingers.
Sorry, dawg. I'll take the L on that one. I didn't do that on purpose, I ain't kiddin'!
Alright then, let's keep this beat fresh!
One down, a lot more to take down, let's go!
No biggie! We still got plenty of time to have some fun.
Enough dicking around...Time to keep on movin' or, the boombox ain't groovin'!
Can't mess around now...Gotta move them feet to the boombox beat!
Play time's over...Time to move to the boombox groove!
Kinda breezy in here, don'tcha think?
Kinda cold in here, T-B-H.
So, what do y'all think?
Is it cool in here, or is just me?
Whoops...Itchy trigger fingers and butter fingers...not a good combination...
My B...Hopefully that won't backfire on me anymore...
Sorry 'bout that, y'all...Let's just...uhh...keep going.
Hope y'all are alright...My finger slipped...
It's all good, don't worry.
Still got some HP left, I'm gucci.
I'm still good!
I've taken a hit or two, it's no biggie.
'Least it ain't Shelly's Super.
Don't worry y'all, I ain't dead!
I ain't going down this easy. I may not have my rocket launcher, but I can still brawl my way out of this!
While I don't have my rocket launcher, I can still beat y'all in a brawl. Just try me!
I may be down to my underwear, but bring it on anyways!
Well, this is it. I'm still not going down without a brawl!
Well, I hope y'all are pleased...
Stare at it...it'll last longer in your retinas, I bet.
Still got one more hit!
I'm likin' this game already!
Woo! Take the L!
Awww yeah! Take those clothes off, dude!
Strip. Them. Clothes.
Ooh, you got destroyed!
You...got wrecked.
Yeah dude! Show 'em what you got!

Max seems to have a similar bodysuit to yours. Do y'all know each other?
I can't help but think that Max set you up in a bodysuit like that...I'm in the ballpark, amirite?
I'd reckon with a suit like that, you must of been doing some brawling...Do you happen to know a 'Max'?
Y'all seem to have the look of a brawler. Have y'all ever fought before?
Hey! You definitely look like a brawler! What's your speciality? Close combat? Long ranged?
Another brawler? Well shit, I thought I was the only one! What do you fight with?
You seem to look like a brawler, but I don't see any weapons on ya...
Wait, What's wrong with your gloves?
Severe? What do you mean, don't you still have your gloves?
(Yeesh...her face is bluer than the time Colt saw El Primo naked for the first time.)
Huh? What's going on?
Hey...you there...uh...armless girl. Y'all need any help?
Woah woah woah! You're actually gonna shoot-
Oh, cowgirl's shootin' again!? Take cover!
Ah shit, here we go again.
Wait, y'all are shooting upwards now...
One last strip...This better be good.
Awww shit, your boobs already? Okay, this is epic.
Hol' up...what about the-
Oh shit, nuttin's stopping her now.
Awwww shit, here it comes!
Well, I don't mind the crocs, but why are y'all wearin' that suit? Y'all look fancier than Mr. P!

Unbelievable.
...Fine. Considering I'm already naked, Fine.
...Is this game over yet?
...Why did that take you so long to take that shit off?
Y'all think this is funny? Well it sure ain't funny for me.
I'm just sitting here showing my skin, and that's all you give me?
C'mon! I'm already getting close to getting naked, and this is what I get?
Take off another accessory, I dare ya. I double dare ya.
You're damn lucky I don't have my rocket launcher with me.
Ah, so just like me! Of course, I wouldn't be that dumb to use my boombox up close, but I do have my ways if it ever come down to it.
Sounds like you might fit in just fine with yours truly! I can't do close ranged shit at all, I tell ya.
Ah, so you're a bit of an all-around brawler. Admittedly, I don't think I'd ever have that capability to fight anyone up close.
Well, where I'm from, anyone can be a brawler if they know how to fight! I'm sure you fit that category smoothly!
Hey now, I rock my own style, Not all dudes are the same ya know.
That's fair. I know quite a few of my peeps that really don't show their true power.
Well, not everyone shows off their weapons, you'd be right about that, but are you really saying that all men are the same?
Oh, bullshit! Anyone that fights in general is a brawler in my eyes!
Well, street fights are just low-brow showdowns, that sounds like Brawlin' to me!
C'mon, that basically screams brawling! If you'd ask anyone else, I'm sure they'd agree.
Yo! What's happenin' over there?
Goddamn it. What a party buster.
Aaaaannnddd there goes my hype.
...What a party pooper.
Yeah...that part.
You still had that thing on?
Took you a long time to take that shit off.
...Wow girl...wow.
Well, it's about time.
...You can't be serious.
Fair enough, fair enough.
I'd probably do that too in your shoes, no worries.
Still a good move.

A little disappointing, but 'aight.
Oh...very funny.
...Really girl?
Oh, gimme a big fat break.
C'mon girl!

YOOOO! That's just wack!
YOOOO! What the fuck!?
YOOOO! That's insane!

I'm just sitting here showing my skin, and that's all you give me?

You're damn lucky I don't have my rocket launcher with me.
I don't usually start shit with other women, but you're really pushin' it.

Wait, why didn't y'all take that off first?
Pretty good choice this time 'round.
Not bad, dawg, not bad.
Not quite explosive, but not quite boring either.

You don't need that shit, don't ya?
That's it? Dawg, you made it seem like there was sumthin' scary under that hat...You look pretty good, not gonna lie!

Now we'all got one less piece of fabric to worry about!

Only one step closer for me to claim the victory!
It'll only be a matter of time before we see 'dat chest...And I don't mean the Brawl Chests either.
What? No! I only blow up people I don't like with my rocket launcher, what kind of question is that?
Oh...shit. That's...Sorry to hear that. I know what it's like feeling burns...Whether that be from myself, or from Barley.
Kinda interesting watching the bullets fly...Just as long as they aren't flying towards me, that is.
I wonder what they're gonna take this time...
Pretty good choice this time 'round.
Not bad, my girl, not bad.

Hey now...I can try to call up Poco to try to heal you. His songs can really do wonders.

Let's take that shit off!
Yay-uh! Strip ya down and go to town!
Now we're talkin'!
(I think Chazz is losin' it...and not because wolf dude bit him.)
Niiiiice.
Damn, that's a nice view, ~name~!
Now that's what Strip Poker is all about, baby!
Thanks for that! Now I won't stop staring!
Now that's a crazy bold move. Y'all got balls!
That was awesome! Wooooo-eeeeee!
I hope you like attention, ~name~, 'cuz that's gonna get you ALL of it!
In the words of Dynamike, "DY-NO-MITE!"
That's what I'm talkin' about! Yuh!
Well, I certainly won't be wearin' one! Even then, Max is actually a girl!
Well, I don't know any guythat uses 'em...Also, Max is a girl...
Max is just a girl colleague of mine. She kinda has this laser attack thing going...and damn she can run!
Well, she has a bodysuit like you, and her entire thing is all about speed. She would make us seem like turtles with that speed of hers!
You wouldn't be wrong there, but what you are wrong about is that Max is a girl...
Yeh...Max pretty much is a guy's name...but she's actually a girl. Just as confusing as Sandy...take a wild guess on what their gender is.
Oh, hell no. You can't stick me in a suit, even if y'all seduce me!
It'd be kinda funny if they did, not gonna lie...But naw...it's more of a girl's thing.
(Hm...something about her don't seem right...maybe I should...say something reassuring to her?)
(Wait, she's still not taking the gloves off?)
Bitch! Don't do that! We ain't outside to do this shit!

And off comes the ~clothing~!

Hey yo...uh...we can stop if we have to, girl.
...Woah. You actually used bullets to strip like that? Damn, girl...I underestimated you!
Huh. I like this girl's style.

Well, that was unexpected, but shit, I ain't complainin'!

Time to open that chest man!
Open that Brawl Chest!
C'mon, ~name~, let's compare our chests for the chicks watching us out there!
Is your chest as hard as mine? Let's find out!
N...You wanna beat up this lil' shit together? Nobody says that word in front of me.
I can't believe he just said that...What, does he think I'm just a n#@&% with a rocket launcher then?
...He's so goddamn lucky I don't have my rocket launcher with me.
You work out? Damn. That's impressive.
For a man who works out, that's pretty baller.
Niiiiice! Flex it, dude!
Gimme a little flex, don'tcha?
Has Pam been feeding ya? Nah I kid, I kid.
I can appreciate chubby guys too...Just look at Gene. Never underestimate him when he's got his Magic Hand comin' at'cha!
Now, that's a nice chest ya got there, my dude!
I can really appreciate a man's chest when I see one, and I gotta say. That's hot.
So what kind of "explosive" are we dealin' with here?
Is it time to release the rocket?
Release 'dat rocket!
Ah...that's...a little disappointing, but hey. It's not about how big it is, it's how big the impact can be.
It doesn't matter on how big it is...It's how ya use it that matters, dawg!
I'm sensing a bit of a connection here...
Ooh...rockets are flyin' with y'all two!
Well, whatever floats your boat, Arash.
Hey, if you do manage to throw the game, I won't be complainin'.
Ah well, more eyecandy for us!
Eh, nothing too special...But pretty nice overall.
Just like mine...Average.
Holy shit, that's on par with a Saturn V!
...That's gotta have a lot of thrust.
No...No fucking way you're doin' what I think you're doing.
Hell yeah, we almost got her naked!
Yeah! Bring out those bombshells!
So how explosive are those..."bombshells?"
Bring those babies out!
...Hol' up...You're eighteen years old, right? right!?
...Please tell me you're of age.
Holy fucking shit. Look, I can be pretty skilled with aiming, but that's just some next level shit right there!
Only one layer to go! C'mon, we can get her naked!
Pretty average, but hey! It's tits. Who doesn't like tits?
Tits are tits after all! Don't really matter the size, but it's still nice seein' them!
Yuh-oh. Haven't seen that much shrinkage since Piper got that remodel.
Woah. Pam would be jealous, I'm pretty sure.
Damn, girl...What'd you pack in those funbags?

state.text: Wh-woah...Oh god. I can see something growing out of that shit...
Oh...oh shit. What the fuck is that growing out of her pussy?

case.state: Aw, shit...is that a misfire?
Uh oh...that don't sound good.
Release the kitt-ay!
Is this what Bibi meant when she says that she's a "Cool Cat?"
It's about time to unleash the beast!
Don't you ever clean that thing?
I wouldn't touch that shit with one of my rockets.
...Y'all need Jesus...but even he seems like he'd nope the fuck out.
...Where the fuck is Barley when you need him...
Just being near you makes me more sick than one of Crow's Switchblades.
What the fu- You'd gotta be the most accurate person in the world to just...do...that!
Meee-wow! I'm sorry, I just so had to do that.
Awww yeah! The beast has been unleashed!
Trimmed? Hairy? Don't matter to me. A beast is a beast!
Brock don't stop for nuttin'!
Yuh! You can't touch this!
Easy!
Brock don't stop!
Wooo! I'm on a roll!
I'm on top of my game, AND this game!
Streaking time! And I don't just mean my winning streak!
Don't get salty now!
Whew...~name~, you did me a favor.
That...was too close.
Woohoo! Saved!
That's right. a Royal Flush, baby!
Woah now, Take it easy...
Easy there, killer...Don't even try getting physical with me.
Hey now, I don't wanna get physical.
...You're just as confusing as Sandy...We didn't even know what gender he was until he began speaking.
Not a lot of my friends wear armor...But damn, that looks pretty heavy.
...You look even thicker than 8-Bit.
You seem fast, but are you as fast as Crow?
You seem fast, but are you faster than a Super Charged Max?
You seem fast, but are y'all faster than Colt's Slick Boots?
You seem fast, but are y'all as fast as a Meteor Rush from El Primo?
Man, I think I can see my reflection on that bald head of yours.
Whew, I cannot lie. That's a pretty big ol' ass y'all got there.
...Y'all are pretty thick, and I've seen PAM thick.
I can't deny...I think Pam would be jealous of dat ass.
Watch where ya point that thing!
Maybe I should hook ya up with Max. She knows a thing or two about sleeker bodysuits.
That cape's cool! But it'll never be as cool as El Primo's...
El Primo's got a cape like that...Y'all should see him when he performs his Flying Elbow Drop! That cape can really sparkle.
Hey now...that ain't cool.
Nobody likes a hacker.
As Colt would like to say, "Cheater!"
Colt seems pretty useful right about now...He knows a thing or two about when someone is actually cheating.
Aww. y'all seem like the huggable kind of cute, like when Bea went into a Hug Convention. Man...she can't even stop herself to save her life.
I bet y'all would get along with Colt. He's always posin'...looking all confident and shit.
...Yeesh, and I thought Mortis was creepy.
...Something about you seems off...Like when I saw Mortis try out that Night Witch outfit.
...Have y'all been drinking out of Barley's stash or sumthin'?
...Barley? I think you've been serving too much! Oh wait...is he even here?
And I thought my friends had wacky hairdos...Damn.
Well, aren't y'all fancy...I bet Piper would be jealous.
Hey, ~name~...Y'all up for a Brawl later? You seem like the kind of person that'd love to fight!
Ooh, another gamer? Y'all ready to level up?
Gamers represent!
Nice, another gamer? Don't see a lot of those around here.
Maybe later we can play some stuff on 8-Bit! They won't mind, don't worry!
Those are some pretty cool glasses...But how 'cool' are they really?
That's a pretty cool gun, just watch where y'all point that thing.
Don't even try pointing that towards me, this box is loaded!
I'm loaded, so don't start with me if you don't wanna go boom.
Yeesh, I don't like the way you're looking at me...
...Something ain't right with you...
Y'all alright over there? If y'all need a homie, I got you.
Y'all alright over there? If y'all need some support over there, I'll go easy on ya.
...Y'all deserve this.
How does it feel getting wrecked? Asshole.
I don't tolerate assholes like you.
...Asshole.
Heh. EMZ has some competition going on.
You have the look of a model, but do y'all got the attitude of one?
I feel that Frank would get along well with you.
I ain't afraid of any monsters. A couple of my homies are monsters too!
Don't feel bad about your appearance. I know some of my buds will like you a lot...Like Poco!
I bet ya that y'all would work well with Poco!
Should I hook you up with Poco? He plays a mean guitar.
If y'all are forming a band, I do know a certain mariachi skeleton that would be interested.
Don't go disappearing on me now...
I already know a certain chameleon that looks as stealthy as you are...Don't even try doing anything funny, ya hear?
A pirate eh? I think Penny would like a word with you.
A pirate eh? I think Darryl would be dying to see ya.
You're giving me some unnecessary creepy Tara vibes...
A robot's playing? Well it ain't too messed up. I wonder if Rico would like this kind of game.
A robot's playing? At least you ain't as insane as that Tick dude.
A robot's playing? Hm. How classy are you? Are we talking Barley classy or Darryl classy?
A robot's playing? How smart are you exactly? I hope y'all are smart enough to be sentient like a certain Carl I know.
What's with that look, ~name~? Can't take a joke?
Geez...Someone just can't take my dicking around, can they?
...Not much of a talker? That's alright. I know plenty of cacti that can't talk.
Uh...hello?
...Huh. That was a clever move on your part. Damn.
...That was pretty good there, ~name~.
There's no way in hell that your glasses are cooler than mine!
If you can name a cooler pair of glasses, y'all will have my respect.
...Do you possibly know Mortis by any chance, ~name~?
That's a pretty cool weapon, but watch where y'all point that thing.
Wouldn't it be funny if we just switched weapons? Nah I kid.
Holy shit, I won!
I won!? I won!
Shot down by the power of my awesomeness!
Boom shacka-lacka!
Tough luck, ~name~! Maybe next time.
Good effort, my dude, but you gotta pay the price.
Y'all are out of luck now!
That's a game over for you, man!
Y'all wanted to play this game, now you gotta forfeit!
Ahh...s-someone's coming to join me? Oh...~name~...
Hoo...Who lost now? Oh, ~name~? C'mon in and join me!
Ooh...so close, my dude.
Eugh...Tough luck there.
Time to stroke it, then!
Time to thrust until the rocket releases!
Y'all suppose it's time to rock out with your cock out?
Stroke it down until you...drown?
Well shit, dawg. Jack it with me!
Alright ~name~...Y'all wanna keep this jack-fest going?
...Wanna see who can cum faster?
Shit dude, all you had to do was ask!
Hell yeah! Stroke it like you mean it!
Atta' Boy, ~name~!
